Articles.Content:
IMGUR album: http://imgur.com/a/r4yCy

Embedded images:

Craft file: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/10679993/SS%20Event%20Horizon%203.zip

Ah, the epitome of over-engineering. This thing will take you wherever you want to go and back with plenty left over to visit your friends in another system. A little shaky of a liftoff and requires some finesse to get out into an orbit, though. I'm working on improving craft control in the first couple stages after liftoff, so you can turn the ship around before your next birthday hits. If you have any suggestions, let me know.

Get the mods here:

NovaPunch:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/3870-0-21-NovaPunch-2-02-RELEASED-July-25th-2013

MechJeb:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/12384-PART-0-21-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-0-9
